_sText:
This map features a new dynamic element. Imagine that you are fighting in the lower area and all of a sudden, warning signs and sirens start going off. You look through the grate to see more lava poring into the room! The lava underneath you begins to rise you panic and run to the nearest ladder or fan all the while having to fight off enemies!

There are 8 ways to get to the top, 4 ladders and 4 fans that blow you upwards. You must jump while on top of the fans for it to blow you.
